overview: An animated short by Qing Huang demonstrating the six essentials in Chinese Painting, according to art critic Jing Hao (fl. AD 920):  1 - Force (chi) - the foremost principle  2 - Rhythm and Mood (yun)  3 - Scheme (si)  4 - The Scene and the Landscape (Jing)  5 - Brushwork (bi)  6 - Ink work (mo)
title: The Way
